# Third-Party Notices (webp-runtime)

This directory vendors runtime artifacts required for animated WebP decoding.

## Included components

1. `com.aureusapps.android:webp-android:1.0.8`
   - Project: https://github.com/UdaraWanasinghe/webp-android
   - License: MIT

2. `org.jetbrains.kotlin:kotlin-stdlib:1.9.24`
   - Project: https://github.com/JetBrains/kotlin
   - License: Apache-2.0

3. `com.getkeepsafe.relinker:relinker:1.4.5`
   - Project: https://github.com/KeepSafe/ReLinker
   - License: Apache-2.0

Refer to upstream projects for complete license texts and notices.
